fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him
Um al-Muʿminīn Um Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
searchname: Um Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyan
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daught of Abi Sufyān
Wife of the Prophet ﷺ who was divorced from Zayn ibn al-Ḥārithah
Daughter of Um Salamah, and step-daughter of the Prophet ﷺ
Nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri
searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri
info: Nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph

fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Hisham ibn Urwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Brother of Ramlah Um Ḥabībah bint Abi Sufyān

fullname: Sālim ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
searchname: Salim ibn Abdullah ibn Umar ibn al-Khattab
info: Son of ʿAbdullah ibn ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb

fullname: Nāfiʿ Abu ʿAbdullāh Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar
searchname: Nafi Abu Abdullah Mawla Ibn Umar
